channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260106.3)
item.description:
What's New

feat: enable free mark by default and improve input method labels

  • Change freeMarkEnabled default from false to true for better UX
  • Update input method display names with clearer descriptions:

- Telex: show w→ư, []→ơư behavior

- Simple Telex 1: show w→w, []→[] behavior

- Simple Telex 2: show w→ư, []→[] behavior

  • Bump version to 20260106.3

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
